mapper.select: select id from band where email=#{email} and phonenum1=#{phone1} and phonenum2=#{phone2} and phonenum3=#{phone3}
select id from member where email=#{email} and phonenum1=#{phone1} and phonenum2=#{phone2} and phonenum3=#{phone3}
select pass from band where id=#{id}
select pass from member where id=#{id}
